statements: SELECT * FROM Student_Attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM Student_Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT class_id, COUNT(*) as total_attendance FROM Student_Attendance GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT * FROM Student_Attendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, attendance_status FROM Student_Attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student_Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM Student_Attendance GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_attendance > 5;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM Student_Attendance WHERE class_id = 101 ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, student_name, class_id FROM Student_Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent';
SELECT class_id, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM Student_Attendance GROUP BY class_id HAVING total_students > 10;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE class_id = 2 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE class_id = 2 AND student_id < 5 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 3 AND class_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_name, date FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE Students.class_id = 1 AND Attendance.date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, class_id, email FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM classes WHERE class_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE class_id = 2 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT students.student_name, classes.class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id WHERE students.class_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM attendance WHERE class_id = 4 AND date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, is_present FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.date >= '2022-01-01' AND attendance.date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, name, age, gender FROM students WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, gender, email FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, a.status FROM students s JOIN attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id WHERE a.attendance_date = '2022-10-10';

SELECT p.participation_date, s.name, c.course_name FROM participation p JOIN students s ON p.student_id = s.student_id JOIN courses c ON p.course_id = c.course_id WHERE p.participation_type = 'In-Class';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, count(course_id) AS enrolled_courses FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT enrollment_id, attendance_date, attended FROM attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Smith' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, count(*) AS total_courses_enrolled FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_courses_enrolled > 2 ORDER BY total_courses_enrolled DESC;

SELECT e.student_id, e.course_id, a.attendance_date, a.attended FROM enrollments e INNER JOIN attendance a ON e.enrollment_id = a.enrollment_id WHERE a.attended = true ORDER BY e.student_id, a.attendance_date DESC;
